name: coreroute
description: A simplified HTTP Router class for Node.js applications

scripts.doc:md: rimraf docs/markdown && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs/markdown src/index.ts
scripts.doc: (npm run doc:md && npm run doc:html) || (rimraf docs ; echo 'ERREUR: La génération de la documentation a échoué. Vérifiez les logs.')
scripts.patch: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run .xscripts && .github/scripts/patch.sh
scripts.minor: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run .xscripts && .github/scripts/minor.sh
scripts.major: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run .xscripts && .github/scripts/major.sh
